ValidationRule.description: Service cases with a "New" status cannot be updated if they have the "Invoicing" type. The case status must be updated to be able to save case changes.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( (ISPICKVAL(Status,"New")), (RecordType.DeveloperName = "Invoicing") , (Change_Invoice_New_Status__c) == true, $Setup.Validation_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = FALSE , ISCHANGED( OwnerId ) = false )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: "Invoicing" type service cases with "New" status cannot be saved without updating the case status. Please change the case Status field.
